description: SPECIFICATIONSCapacities8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GBColor(s)Dark Grey/White, Dark Grey/Blue, Dark Grey/BlackUSB 2.0USB 2.0 High-SpeedOperating Temperature0C - 60CStorage Temperature-20C - 85CSystem RequirementsWindows 8, Windows 7, Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP1, SP2), Windows 2000, Apple Mac OS X or laterRegulatory ComplianceFCC, CEWarranty10-year limited warrantyRemarkably innovative for something so small,Leef Fuse USB Driveintegrates special magnets into the design to make the device more difficult to lose.The Leefdesign team found a magnetic metal alloy that does not harm flash memory and developed the first ever USB drive with magnetic properties.(WARNING: playing with the magnetic connections inLeef Fusecan become addictive and result in  work time and greater relaxation).
title: Leef Fuse USB 2.0 32GB High-speed USB Flash Drive with Magnet Cap and PrimeGrade Memory (Charcoal/Black)
